title: macOS iOS Android and Linux
extract: Mac OS is the computer operating system for Apple Computer's Macintosh line of personal computers and workstations. ... OS X has a modular design intended to make it easier to add new features to the operating system in the future. It runs UNIX applications as well as older Mac applications.
extract_html: Mac OS is the computer operating system for Apple Computer's Macintosh line of personal computers and workstations. ... OS X has a modular design intended to make it easier to add new features to the operating system in the future. It runs UNIX applications as well as older Mac applications.
